name: DISCHARGED
description:
Destroy all the non-reusable batteries that have inveded the powerplant !

Use the power of Lithium to absorb the energy of your oponnent's attacks !

Controls :

Arrow Keys : Move Around

O : Attack

P : Switch offense / Defense mode

In defense mode, absorb the ennemie's attacks to charge your battery, then switch to offense mode to deal damage !

Made for the Global Game Jam 2022
